ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: The gameIsGoingOn modifier restricts access to hit and stand to prevent users from interacting with non-existent or completed games.
ImplementedSecurityControls.BetLimits: Minimum and maximum bet values (minBet and maxBet) are enforced to control bet sizes.

FallbackFunctionality: A fallback function is present to receive Ether but does not perform any actions, potentially allowing for accidental deposits without intent.
